item.title: DevOps Concepts
item.description: What is DevOps? DevOps is a set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops). It aims to shorten the systems development life cycle and provide continuous delivery with high software quality. Build Automation What is Build Automation? Build automation: automation of the process of preparing code for deployment to a live environment Depending on what languages are used, code needs to be compiled, linted, minified, transformed, unit tested, etc.
